question:
Which hero was the fastest?
which hero refers to superhero_name; fastest refers to MAX(attribute_value) WHERE attribute_name = 'Speed';
query: SELECT T1.superhero_name FROM superhero AS T1 INNER JOIN hero_attribute AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.hero_id INNER JOIN attribute AS T3 ON T2.attribute_id = T3.id WHERE T3.attribute_name = 'Speed' ORDER BY T2.attribute_value DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
